info.title: UpdateAdminClient
info.description: Update location operation endpoints and objects.

get.description: Get the list of update locations.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.  The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

get.description: Get an update location based on name.

parameters.name: subscriptionId
parameters.description: Subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription.  The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

parameters.name: updateLocation
parameters.description: The name of the update location.

RegionUpdateState.description: State of the region in regard to update.

UpdateLocation.description: Information related to a location's update status.

nextLink.description: The link to get the next page of update locations.

currentOemVersion.description: Current OEM version of your AzureStack deployment.

currentVersion.description: Current version of your AzureStack deployment.

UpdateLocationModel.description: Model which holds information related to update location.

UpdateLocationParameter.name: updateLocation
UpdateLocationParameter.description: The name of the update location.
